content.description: Sit start to the left of 1961 on jugs on the ledge under the roof.  Climb straight up through slopers and jugs to top out on the highest point above the roof.
content.location: On the mini-roof in the Spy vs. Spy Area.  The line starts to the right of "Prohias", before the roof curves back toward the wall.

content.description: Sit start with feet on the back portion of the overhanging wall (not on the weak stone floor where you could just stand up to hit holds)    Start with hands underclinging under the lip on small crimps. Move straight up through fun huecos to a harsh top out.
content.location: The first problem on the mini-roof in the Spy vs. Spy Area, to the left of the downclimb vine.

content.description: As far left under the mini-roof as possible.  Sit start absurdly low on the ledge under the roof with your feet out right.  Climb straight up to top out.  Short, but fun.
content.location: As far left under the mini-roof in the Spy vs. Spy Area as possible.  It looks as though the line runs into the ground, but don't be deceived.  With your feet out right, you can start the problem just fine.

content.description: Sit start on the sloping rail.  Trend left through more sloping rails to a smooth top out to the right of the small block.
content.location: The first clean line you come to on the wall past the Acorn Boulder.  To the left of the line of big right facing jugs.

content.description: Sit start on low underclings and good feet between the two trees and to the right of the block.  Climb straight up to the pinch in a pocket, then traverse left to great left facing jugs for the top out.
content.location: Between the two trees and to the right of the block at the far left of the Spy vs. Spy Area.

content.description: Sit start on crimps on the low bulge.  Move up to a deep pocket and top out over the duck head.
content.location: Lies just right of the downclimb vine in the Spy vs. Spy Area.  Look for the feature at the top of the wall that looks like a duck's head.  Start directly below for "Darkwing Duck".

content.description: Sit start on the jugs on the ledge under the mini-roof.  Move to the right facing rail above the roof.  Follow the rail up through slopers and top out above the big knob.
content.location: To the left of the downclimb vine and "Bewildered".  The line starts under the mini-roof directly in front of the tree.

content.description: The Spy vs. Spy Area is made up of some shorter but super fun problems involving big moves to big holds.  Look for the mini-roof for some burly and unusual (and quite enjoyable!) lines.
